thread.title: Ireland Baldwin strips NUDE in 'freeing' photoshoot | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ireland Baldwin strips NUDE in 'freeing' photoshoot | Daily Mail Online

author: Sam Machado For Dailymail.Com
title: Ireland Baldwin strips NUDE in 'freeing' photoshoot | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share She captioned the pic: 'one of the most freeing and special adventures of my life. excited for what the future holds' Bikini gal: The model wore a green swimsuit for a previous social media post The blonde beauty has typically been the type to let her curves show on Instagram. Earlier this week, Ireland wore a green bikini for a photo and wrote in the caption: 'I'm pale white. I love bread and beer. I have flaws and I f-cking love them and I love my body and so should you.Life is beautiful and it's too short. It's not worth obsessing over body image and vanity. Just live in the moment and enjoy your company.' Athletics: The 21-year-old knows yoga poses as she did a handstand near a beach When she's not flashing her body, Ireland can be seen doing other activities on social media, including yoga. In a snapshot, she does a handstand against a post in a white top with black leggings. She captioned this picture: 'I can't leave this place. thank you @fleurswim family.' Woman of class: The daughter of Alec Baldwin and Kim Basinger attended a celebration of the 150 Most Fashionable Women in West Hollywood, California last month Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
